DataElement.preferredName: Person Specimen Tissue Donate Consent Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not the participant consents to donate samples of tissue for future research.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the consent or permission from a person to allow a bit of tissue or blood or urine to be collected and used for research purposes.

Property.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.:Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.:Permission to do something.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.
Someone who gives blood or tissue or an organ to be used in another person.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: patients' acknowledgement and acceptance of participation in a clinical trial.

ValueDomain.preferredName: CDISC SDTM Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response Terminology Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Terminology codelist used with Yes No Unknown or Not Applicable Response within the Clinical Data Interchange Standards Consortium Study Data Tabulation Model._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown/not applicable.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the participant agree to
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the participant agree to donate some of their tissue biopsy material that is not required for treatment or diagnosis to the ACSR for future research that may be used to learn about, prevent, diagnose, or treat HIV-related diseases and/or cancer(s)?
